name: üêû Issue Report # unique name for this form template (üêû :beetle: \U0001F41E); must be unique from all other templates, including Markdown templates (mandatory).
description: Report a bug, error, or other inconsistent and/or unexpected behavior from this repository. # information about this template that will appear in the template chooser interface (required).
title: '[BUG]: <title>' # default title that will be pre-populated in the issue submission form (optional).
labels: bug, needs triage # labels that will automatically be added to issues created with this template (optional).
assignees: '' # individuals that will be automatically assigned to issues created with this template (optional).

---

    Thanks for taking the time to complete this form!
    To help us process this issue we recommend adding the following information:

     - Steps to reproduce the issue

     - Expected and actual results

    üêõ Before you open a new issue, please [check](http://example.github.com/issues) if a 
    similar issue (open or closed) already exists.

    ‚ùì Do you want to ask a question that is not a bug report or 
    feature request? Please post it in the [Questions and Help section](http://example.github.com/help)!

    üìö Please review the [Code of Conduct](http://github.com/stealthydefenestrator/readthedocs-repo-template/.github/blob/master/CODE_OF_CONDUCT.md) and [guidelines](http://github.com/stealthydefenestrator/readthedocs-repo-template/.github/blob/master/README#issues)
    Create separate requests for each problem.

Have you read Atom's Code of Conduct? By filing an Issue, you are expected to comply with it, including treating everyone with respect: 

? Are you looking for support? The message board is the best place for getting support: https://discuss.atom.io


-->

opening a new issue. Confirm that you completed a task by typing an "X" 
between the brackets:

- [ ] Task 2
- [ ] Task 3
